text: Skazali te, kto prochit souchastnikov (Allakhu): "Yesli b Allakh zhelal togo, My b nikomu, krome Nego, ne poklonyalis' - Ni my, ni nashi praottsy, I ni na chto by bez Nego Zapretov my ne nalagali b". Tak delali i te, Kotoryye do nikh (greshili). Neuzhto v missii poslannikov yest' chto-to, Pomimo yasnoy peredachi (Otkroveniy)
